name: CUT THE CARS - Racing has never been so fun for kids
name_original: CUT THE CARS - Racing has never been so fun for kids
description:
GET READY FOR A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE !!!!!!!!!

You have Cut fruits & you have cut vegetables and even birds...How about CUTTING CARS,PLANES, CYCLES & avoid them from colliding into our jogger who is jogging listening to music with his eyes closed. Be careful not to cut the AMBULANCE because we do not want to harm the patients in them also do not cut the apples and the bird that brings the golden apple .(WE DONT BELIEVE IN CUTTING "APPLE")

Special features :

1. THREE different modes – Classic(for your kid),Timed(for you) AND CRAZY MODE (for the crazy you)
2. GAME CENTER enabled to check global high scores
3. Various background themes in classic mode
4.BONUS apples in crazy mode


HAVE FUN WITH CUTTING CARS, BOTH FOR KIDS AND GROWN UPS

WARNING : YOU GIVE THE IPAD TO YOUR KIDS AND THERE IS A GOOD CHANCE THAT THEY WILL GET SO ADDICTED TO CUT THE CARS THAT YOU MIGHT NOT GET IT BACK !!!
